## R-Chart Gallery Trial for January 29th

```{r}
# Create data
## Changed date range
set.seed(124)
date <- paste(   "2024/01/" , sample(seq(1,31),6) , sep="")
value <- sample(seq(1,100) , 6)
data <- data.frame(date,value)

# Let's change the date to the "date" format:
data$date <- as.Date(data$date)
 
# So we can sort the table:
data <- data[order(data$date) , ]
 
# Easy to make it better now: 
## change y axis name, color of lines
plot(data$value~data$date , type="b" , lwd=3 , col=rgb(0.1,0.7,0.1,0.8) , 
     ylab="Hours Streamed" , 
     xlab="date" , 
     bty="l" , pch=20 , cex=4)
abline(h=seq(0,100,10) , col="grey", lwd=0.8)
```
